name: Michael Rodriguez
summary_blurb: Michael Rodriguez is an Analyst at Fidelity Asset Management with a focus on the Technology and Consumer sectors. He has experience in fundamental analysis and has contributed to investment processes for mutual funds. His background includes roles in equity research and fixed income sales, providing a well-rounded perspective in financial markets.
notable_experience: William Blair, Fixed Income Sales & Trading
education_highlight: B.S. in Finance from University of Michigan, Ross School of Business
